name: Nominitter
tagline: Twitter game where users nominate the person they know that best meets a specific description
body:
This is the home of Nominitter, a ridiculous twitter game where you tweet the username of the person who best meets the criteria of the current round. For example:

Round 1: Most likely person you know to get arrested. Nominate your pick by tweeting @ them with #nominitter.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
